description:
"“Finding Chuchu” is a thrilling arcade shooting game that anyone can easily enjoy.
Players dodge waves of enemy bullets while using a variety of magic spells, adding a touch of strategy to the classic shoot-'em-up experience.

=== Game Features
1. Variety of Attack Magic
Use over ten types of offensive magic with simple controls.
Perform powerful “one-hit finish” casting spells through technical input for maximum efficiency.

2. Game Modes
Story Mode: The main content where you can experience an exciting and immersive storyline.
Arcade Mode: A stage-clear style mode separate from the story, perfect for quick play sessions.
Online Mode:
Check your global ranking on the scoreboards with scores saved to the cloud.
Use the Map Maker to design your own maps, upload and share them on the cloud, or play maps created by other players.

=== Recommended For
Those looking for a fun and exciting game to enjoy in short play sessions.
Players who love challenging high-score arcade experiences.
Fans of nostalgic retro arcade shooting vibes.
Anyone who enjoys creating and sharing maps to compete with friends."
